images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Italy in summer, showcasing picturesque Italian cities, sunny beaches, and culinary delights.
AI-selected These destination images will showcase specific attractions in Italy, highlighting cultural sites and local festivals to entice travelers.
AI-selected These destination images will showcase specific attractions in Italy, highlighting cultural sites and local festivals to entice travelers.
AI-selected Promotional icons will highlight special offers and deals related to travel packages to Italy, making it easier for customers to identify discounts.

AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and trustworthiness in the email campaign.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Italy in summer
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting Italian summer landscapes, sunny beaches, and cultural experiences
highlighting iconic landmarks and local cuisine

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в Италию!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Italy in summer, showcasing picturesque Italian cities, sunny beaches, and culinary delights.".
